name: Pose of Faith
description:
Features
  • Survive an endless falling simulator while trying to do as many poses as possible!
  • Try to beat your highscore!
  • Change the colours of your character. Pink, Purple, Orange? Maybe even make your player invisible, who knows!
Controls
  • Move: A + D
  • Poses: Q, W, E, 1, 2, 3, 4, Z, X, C, V, F, F1, F2, F3
  • Die: R
Credits

Coding - Jack Fletcher

UI + Art - Alex Davis

Death Sound - Replix  https://freesound.org/people/Replix/sounds/173126/
